<div class="hero" markdown>

![TAPPaaS](tappaas-logo.png){ .hero-logo }

### Trusted Automated Private Platform as a (self-hosted) Service

Deploy and run your applications in a self-hosted cloud, with all the enterprise class capabilities of modern cloud infrastructure, but without having to care about the complexity. TAPPaaS give you freedom, and resiliency of your Digital life whether you are a small business, a government organization, an NGO or a community of homes

[Install TAPPaaS](installation/index.md){ .md-button .md-button--primary }
[View on GitHub](https://github.com/TAPPaaS){ .md-button }

</div>

## Why TAPPaaS?

TAPPaaS provides a complete platform for building and running cloud-native applications. Whether you're a startup looking for a simple deployment solution or an enterprise requiring sophisticated multi-tenant capabilities, TAPPaaS scales with your needs.

<div class="grid" markdown>

!!! tip "For Developers"

    Focus on writing code, not managing infrastructure. TAPPaaS handles the complexities of deployment, scaling, and operations so you can ship faster.

!!! tip "For Operations"

    Gain visibility and control over your entire application portfolio with built-in monitoring, logging, and management capabilities.

!!! tip "For Organizations"

    Reduce cloud costs, improve developer productivity, and maintain compliance with a platform you control.

</div>
